sogou-CET4.n/v: 星号; 标记[出现6次)];主演; 主角; 表演[出现0次)]

sogou-gaokao.n: 明星[出现2次)];星级[出现1次)];星; 恒星[出现1次)]
sogou-gaokao.n/v: 主演; 主角; 表演[出现2次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 星星; 恒星[出现64次)];明星; 才华出众者[出现30次)]
sogou-zhongkao.n/v: 主演; 主角; 表演[出现3次)]

1.en: And with a straight face you're gonna tell students that America is so star-spangled awesome that we're the only ones who have the freedom.
1.cn: 而你居然还一本正经地告诉学生美国已经是世界上独一无二的国家，我们是唯一拥有自由的人！

2.en: Prof. WIENER: Well, you know, it's a little hard to believe today that a president would fear the power of a rock star.
2.cn: 维纳：好的。你知道，在今天看来，我们很难相信一位总统会害怕一个摇滚明星。

3.en: Not the sun, but only the morning-star shone upon His opening tomb.
3.cn: 没有太阳，只有晨星发光照在那挪开的坟墓上。

0.cn: 他是大明星，我的胖胖大明星。

1.en: There he is. There's our star. You were great.
1.cn: 我们的明星来了。你演得好棒。

2.en: Oh. Well then way to go, you big movie star.
2.cn: 喔，那么你去吧，你这个电影明星！

3.en: I haven't seen this dress. Star in a movie.
3.cn: 我还没有看过这套礼服。去看电影明星吧。

4.en: Although, I should probably tell you, she's a porn star.
4.cn: 不过我得告诉你，她是色情明星。

5.en: I never got a D before. I used to be the biggest star in middle school. You're still a star, dearest one.
5.cn: 我以前从没得过D，我在初中时是大明星。你现在仍然是明星，亲爱的。

6.en: Well, what was the plan? Waitress for six months and then become a movie star. Was there a plan B? TV star.
6.cn: 那你原来打算怎么样？当六个月服务员然后成为电影明星。有没有B计划？电视明星。

7.en: Yeah, you know what, bro? You're not star. That is a star. Get you hands off me. Get you hands off me. You don't push my body.
7.cn: 知道吗，你才不是什么明星，那才叫明星。把你手拿开。把你手拿开。不许推我。

8.en: You are gonna be a huge star. I'm gonna hug you. You hug me. All right.
8.cn: 你会变成超级大明星。我要抱你。来抱吧。

9.en: What happened to you, Will? You used to be the star of this lab.
9.cn: 你怎么回事，威尔？你曾经是这个实验室的明星。

10.en: Yeah, you're roommate is a soap opera star. Your character is in a coma.
10.cn: 你的室友是连续剧明星。你的角色在昏迷中。

11.en: Max, the guy who died in front of our shop last night was a rock star.
11.cn: Max 昨晚在我们店门口死翘翘的那人是个摇滚明星。

12.en: Yeah. Lucas was our star in middle school. What were you? I was his cute friend.
12.cn: 是啊，卢卡斯曾是我们初中的明星。那你呢？我是他可爱的朋友。

13.en: Yes, it does! The star player has just arrived. No way! Someone else. Please! Anyone else.
13.cn: 那可不，明星选手驾到。门都没有，拜托换别人，谁都好。

14.en: No, it was Ginger. I remember, because when he told me, I said, the movie star.
14.cn: 不，是金吉儿，我之所以记得是因为他告诉我的时候，我说“电影明星”。

15.en: I know, but you're going to be a TV star and you haven't left me yet. That takes guts.
15.cn: 我知道但你即将成为电视明星而你还没有甩掉我，这需要莫大的勇气啊。

16.en: I'm not talking about you, I'm talking about me. You, my exotic young friend, are my star.
16.cn: 我不是在说你，是说我呢，你，我来自异国他乡的青年朋友，就是我的明星。

17.en: That's ridiculous. I'm not a Star, just a regular famous actor. Yeah and I'm a horrible, horrible, person.
17.cn: 别傻了，我才不是明星，只是一般的名演员。而我是个很糟糕的人。

18.en: Because I'm married. That's right, I am a married woman. And I came to a TV star's apartment to have an affair.
18.cn: 因为我已经结婚了，没错，我是有夫之妇，还跑到一个电视明星家搞外遇。

19.en: I'm done with this conversation. Done with this conversation? In any other family, I would have been the star!
19.cn: 我不想再跟你讨论这个话题了。不想谈了吗？换在其他家庭我就会是个明星。
